name: com.cakelab.arflow
description: The ARFlow client is responsible for on-device AR data collection and high-performance AR data streaming. We implement the ARFlow client as a Unity application that can be easily ported to different platforms and devices.

samples.description: A scene demonstrating using the ARFlow client for an XR Foundation-supported device.
A sample scene demonstrating client with mock data.
A sample scene demonstrating client with data from a Unity scene.
A scene an XR Foundation-supported device, with Xihe inference displayed on client.
